title: v2.31
notes: Fixed several bugs impairing playback experience (e.g. slow loading, app freezing, and more -- all fixed).
Improved search bar so that results are loaded faster
Devices running iOS 12 and lower can now add songs directly from Apple Music.
When you open the app, the last playlist you were listening to will be queued up and ready to go.

title: v2.3
notes: Press the volume button while trimming songs to instantly save the values.
Use the search bar to add from over 60 million songs on Apple Music
See precise millisecond values while trimming songs

title: v2.2
notes: Add songs directly from Apple Music by sharing the song URL

title: v2.1
notes: The app has a new look

title: v1.1
notes: Add support for iOS 11 and iOS 12
Imported tracks will be added to your iCloud Library
